'''Smaragdus Jadeite''' is an item abundant with elemental energy, coming from Stonemarrow in the mountains. If a person without a [[Vision]] is in prolonged contact with it, they will fall seriously ill and suffer from hallucinations like with [[Tang Wuchou]].

[[Madame Ping]] uses the Smaragdus Jadeite to create the [[Serenitea Pot]] for the player.

Smaragdus Jadeite is different from [[Smaragdus Nephrite Fragment|Smaragdus Nephrite]], a less rare and valuable substance often said to be the outer surface of the ore. Unlike the jadeite core, the nephrite does not contain traces of elemental energy.

After realizing its effects, [[Krosl]] instead used Smaragdus Nephrite to craft some hairpins, which he lent to [[Zhiqiao]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|A Teapot to Call Home: Part I}}</ref>
